PHP 데이터베이스 연동

November 9, 2018

form이 들어간 html이고 데이터에서 어떤 데이터를 끌어올지 결정

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <style>
    h1 {
      font-family: fantasy;
    }
    label {
      font-family: monospace;
    }
    form {
      width: 450px;
      margin: auto;
      padding-bottom: 20px;
      border: 2px solid red;
      text-align: center;
    }
    input {
      width: 25%;
    }
    option {
      text-align: center;
    }
  </style>
  <head>
    <title>Main Gate of Database</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
  </head>
  <body>
    <form action = "database.php" method="post">
      <h1>Querying a MySQL database.</h1>
      <label>Select a field to display:
        <select name = "view" required>
          <option value="" disabled selected>--Select your Option--</option>
          <option value="all">*</option>
          <option value="id">ID</option>
          <option value="title">Title</option>
          <option value="category">Category</option>
          <option value="isbn">ISBN</option>
        </select>
      </label>
      <br><br>
      <input type="submit" name="submit" value="Send Query">
    </form>
  </body>
</html>

php파일로 html메인페이지에서 받았을떄 알고리즘 적용 카테고리 선택시 선택사항만 output

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <style>
    div.top {
      position: absolute;
      align-items: center;
      left: 30%;
    }
    div.bot {
      position: relative;
      top: 300px;
    }
    table {
      margin: auto;
      /*position:relative;
      top:100px;*/
      border: 2px solid red;
      color:yellow;
      border-color:blue;
      font-family: fantasy;
      text-align: center;
    }
    body {
      background-color: black;
      color: white;
      position: relative;
    }
  </style>
  <?php
    $dsn="mysql:host=localhost;dbname=books";
    $username="iw3htp";
    $password="password";
    $id=$_POST['view'];
    $cnt=0;
    try {
      $conn=new PDO($dsn,$username,$password);
      $conn->setAttribute(PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE,PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION);
      $getAll=$conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM books");
      $getAll->execute();
    }catch(PDOException $e) {
      echo "Error: ".$e->getMessage();
    }
    $connect=null;
  ?>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>Selected contents</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <?php
      $getAll=$conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM books ORDER BY id ASC");
      $getAll->execute();
     ?>
     <div class="top">
    <table border = 1>
      <?php
        switch($id) {
          case 'all':
            for ($i=0; $view=$getAll->fetch(); $i++) {
              $cnt=$i+1;?>
       <tr>
         <td><?php echo $view['id']?></td>
         <td><?php echo $view['title']?></td>
         <td><?php echo $view['category']?></td>
         <td><?php echo $view['isbn']?></td>
       </tr>
      <?php }
        break;

        case 'id':
        for ($i=0; $view=$getAll->fetch(); $i++) {
          $cnt=$i+1;?>
        <tr>
          <td><?php echo $view['id']?></td>
        </tr>
      <?php }
        break;

        case 'title':
        for ($i=0; $view=$getAll->fetch(); $i++) {
          $cnt=$i+1;?>
        <tr>
          <td><?php echo $view['title']?></td>
        </tr>
      <?php }
        break;

        case 'category':
        for ($i=0; $view=$getAll->fetch(); $i++) {
          $cnt=$i+1;?>
        <tr>
          <td><?php echo $view['category']?></td>
        </tr>
      <?php }
        break;

        case 'isbn':
        for ($i=0; $view=$getAll->fetch(); $i++) {
          $cnt=$i+1;?>
        <tr>
          <td><?php echo $view['isbn']?></td>
        </tr>
      <?php }
        break;
      }//end of switch
      ?></div>
      <div class="bot">
      <?php
        echo "Your search yielded ".$cnt." results.";
        echo "<p></p>";
        echo "Thank you for using our database."; ?>
    </div>
      </table>
  </body>
</html>

데이터베이스 코드

-- phpMyAdmin SQL Dump
-- version 4.8.3
-- https://www.phpmyadmin.net/
--
-- Host: 127.0.0.1
-- Generation Time: Oct 29, 2018 at 10:59 PM
-- Server version: 10.1.36-MariaDB
-- PHP Version: 7.2.11

SET SQL_MODE = "NO_AUTO_VALUE_ON_ZERO";
SET AUTOCOMMIT=0;
START TRANSACTION;
SET time_zone="+00:00";

DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS books;
CREATE DATABASE books;
USE books;

CREATE TABLE `books` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `title` text NOT NULL,
  `category` text NOT NULL,
  `isbn` int(11) NOT NULL
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

--
-- Dumping data for table `books`
--

INSERT INTO `books` (`id`,`title`,`category`,`isbn`) VALUES
(1, 'Visual Basic 2010 How to Program', 'Programming', 132152134),
(2, 'Visual C# 2010 How to Program', 'Programming', 132151421),
(3, 'Java How to Program', 'Programming', 132575663),
(4, 'C++ How to Program', 'Programming', 132662361),
(5, 'C How to Program', 'Programming', 136123562),
(6, 'Internet & World Wide Web How to Program', 'Programming', 132151006),
(7, 'Yong Bum Kim Operating Systems', 'Operating Systems', 131828274);
COMMIT;

drop user iw3htp@localhost;
flush privileges;
CREATE USER
iw3htp@localhost
IDENTIFIED BY 'password';

GRANT ALL
ON books.*
TO iw3htp@localhost
IDENTIFIED BY 'password';

최초로 phpmyadmin에서 import할때는 drop user 불필요
